page.title: 10SAILING CLUB AND COASTLINE.
page.content: West Kirby Sailing club was founded in 1892 and has at present 834 members the youngest being 10 and the eldest over 80. The Sailing Club own their own boats which can be hired but the majority of members own their own craft.Members sail on the Marine Lake or on the Estuary.The club organises its own regattas and also compete against other local clubs. The coasline especially in Caldy is suffering from erosion by the sea and this is an issue felt by many people to be of great importance.There are also worries about the future of the beaches as there has been a steady encroachment made by Spartina Grass which spreads very rapidly and alters the nature of the land.Much research has taken place but no solutions have yet been found.
